title: Horizon Forbidden West - State of Play Gameplay Reveal | PS5
author: PlayStation
description: Join Aloy as she braves the Forbidden West, a deadly frontier that conceals mysterious new threats.

localize.description: アロイは、新たな脅威を秘めた死の辺境「禁断の西部」に挑みます。
localize.title: Horizon Forbidden West - State of Play Gameplay Reveal | PS5

localize.description: 加入Aloy的行列，她将勇闯 "西部禁区"，一个隐藏着神秘新威胁的致命边疆。
localize.title: 地平线禁忌之西--游戏状态揭秘 | PS5

localize.description: 加入Aloy的行列，她將勇闖 "西部禁區"，一個隱藏着神祕新威脅的致命邊疆。
localize.title: 地平線禁忌之西--遊戲狀態揭祕 | PS5
